title: Getting Started with AskUI SDK
excerpt: Complete tutorial on building your first computer use agent with the AskUI Python SDK and connecting to devices.
content:
Get started with AskUI SDK in minutes. This tutorial will guide you through creating your first automation project.

## Installation

Install the AskUI SDK using pip:

```bash
pip install askui
```

## First Steps

1. Create a new project
2. Initialize AskUI
3. Connect to a device
4. Write your first automation

## Example Code

```python
from askui import AskUI

ui = AskUI()
ui.connect_to_device()
ui.click('button')
```

## Next Steps

Explore our documentation for more advanced features and examples.
author: Alex Rivera
